display_long_description:
#  Welcome to the Super RC (Early Access) and now Free-to-Play!

We’ve chosen to launch **Super RC** in Early Access so we can gather community feedback, refine the experience, and expand the roster of cars and content as development continues.

Please join our Discord (**Discord.gg/BPG**) to actively participate in the game's development and to get a chance to win free goodies!   

#  What is SUPER RC?

Unbox your car and assemble it by hand, design dream tracks with track editors, race against opponents in single and multiplayer, and go wild with friends in **Sandbox Mode**. 

When you’re ready for more, hit up the **Hobby Shop** to test-drive and buy new rides.

#  Buy It.  Build It.  Drive It.

[media]

The base game includes the **Turbo Jumper** and  over three hours of singleplayer races and trials, sandbox mode, and up to 8-player online racing.

#  Go Wild in Sandbox!

[media]

Spawn dozens of ramps, props, and obstacles to build wild obstacle courses with your friends. Test crazy ideas or create chaos — your imagination is the only limit.

#  Try Before You Buy!
[media]

Hit up the Hobby Shop to expand your RC collection with optional cars:  The GT3 for precision racing, the Short Course Truck for off-road power, the Crawler for precision off-roading, and the Basher for extreme stunts.  

#  The Founder's Pack!
[media]

In **Mixed Reality** define your play space, and tracks and cars auto-scale to fit, letting you race and crawl through your living room, garage, or even your backyard.

#  Eat. Sleep. Drive. Repeat!

[media]

We’ve chosen to launch **Super RC** in Early Access so we can gather community feedback, refine the experience, and expand the roster of cars and content as development continues.

Please join our Discord (**Discord.gg/BPG**) to actively participate in the game's development and to get a chance to win free goodies!   

#  What is SUPER RC?

Unbox your car and assemble it by hand, design dream tracks with track editors, race against opponents in single and multiplayer, and go wild with friends in **Sandbox Mode**. 

When you’re ready for more, hit up the **Hobby Shop** to test-drive and buy new rides.

#  Buy It.  Build It.  Drive It.

The base game includes the **Turbo Jumper** and  over three hours of singleplayer races and trials, sandbox mode, and up to 8-player online racing.

#  Go Wild in Sandbox!

Spawn dozens of ramps, props, and obstacles to build wild obstacle courses with your friends. Test crazy ideas or create chaos — your imagination is the only limit.

Hit up the Hobby Shop to expand your RC collection with optional cars:  The GT3 for precision racing, the Short Course Truck for off-road power, the Crawler for precision off-roading, and the Basher for extreme stunts.  

#  The Founder's Pack!
